---
title: Nasazení dokumentace
---

Na této stránce si ukážeme, jak nasadit dokumentaci na virtuální server.

```sh
sudo su

export PORT=${PORT}$
echo "
[Unit]
Description=quarto_templates_docs
Requires=docker.service
After=docker.service

[Service]
Restart=always
RestartSec=30
ExecStart=/usr/bin/docker container run --rm -p ${PORT}:5000 --name 'quarto_templates_docs_container' quarto_templates_docs:latest quarto preview . --host '0.0.0.0' --port 5000 --render all
ExecStop=/usr/bin/docker stop -t 2 'quarto_templates_docs_container'
ExecStopPost=/usr/bin/docker rm -f 'quarto_templates_docs_container'

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
" > /etc/systemd/system/quarto_templates_docs.service

systemctl start quarto_templates_docs
systemctl enable quarto_templates_docs
systemctl status quarto_templates_docs
```

Nový deployment se pak dělá příkazy:

```sh
sudo su
make deploy_docs_vm
```
